name: Support Qarantine
description:
In 2020 the v-216 virus has taken over the world and people started living in their homes to protect against this virus. Now people are in a very difficult situation, they cannot leave their homes and cannot meet their needs. Our name is YKDT, we are a military aid team our task is to help them by bringing the materials they need to their homes if we want people to continue living we have to do this. Solidarity requires this.

Movements
W-A-S-D Directions
E - Take Quest/Finish Quest
LMB - Take Items
RMB - Drop Items

Oyunerbabi project, this is a solidarity game. This project, which should be completed within 48 hours, was completed in about 25 hours, we used the assets from the unity asset store.

Game Download Link
https://oyunerbabi.itch.io/support-qarantine

https://oyunerbabi.com/
